hero.title: Tranquilo
hero.subtitle: Luxury Villa with Hotel Services
hero.description: Discover a world of calm and beauty in the heart of North Hurghada, where modern luxury meets authentic Egyptian hospitality.

passion.title: Born from Passion
passion.description: We are passionate about traveling and meeting new people. In 2023, we decided to create our luxury villa in North Hurghada, a place where tranquility meets sophistication.

vision.title: A Vision Realized
vision.description: After months of careful planning, we fell in love with this peaceful location in North Hurghada. Every detail has been thoughtfully designed to create an authentic and welcoming space.

dream.title: A Dream Come True
dream.description: We worked with skilled local artisans to bring our vision to life. Using premium materials and modern architecture, we created a haven where guests feel at home, away from the hustle and bustle of city life.

parallax.title: Experience Tranquility
parallax.subtitle: Where luxury meets the Red Sea, creating unforgettable moments of peace and beauty.

features.title: Why Choose Tranquilo?
features.subtitle: Modern luxury villa designed for ultimate comfort and relaxation

capacity.title: Perfect Capacity
capacity.description: Our villa comfortably accommodates guests with spacious rooms and luxurious amenities for the perfect getaway.

luxury.title: Hotel-Level Service
luxury.description: Enjoy the comfort of a private villa with the luxury of hotel services, including housekeeping and concierge assistance.

location.title: Prime Location
location.description: Located in North Hurghada with easy access to the Red Sea, offering the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience.

owner.title: Meet Your Host
owner.description: Hello! I'm Nabil, your host at Tranquilo Hurghada. I'm passionate about hospitality and creating unforgettable experiences for our guests. Having lived and traveled extensively, I understand what makes a perfect getaway. I'm here to ensure your stay is nothing short of extraordinary.
owner.name: Nabil Laaouina

built.title: Built with Love in 2025
built.description: Our villa was completed in 2025 after careful construction by skilled local artisans. We are proud of what we've achieved together - a space that combines modern luxury with authentic Egyptian charm.

cta.title: Ready for Your Perfect Getaway?
cta.subtitle: Don't wait any longer. Come and discover this haven of tranquility where you can recharge and enjoy moments of pure relaxation.
